Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: (Wothuka) wathi: “Yeha kum! Ndiza kuba nomntwana ekubeni ndingumfazi owalupheleyo nendoda yam iyile yalupheleyo oku kwayo? Inene! Ngummangaliso lo.”
Zathi zona: “Umangazwa ngummiselo ka-Allâh kusini na? INceba ka-Allâh neentsikelelo zaKhe mazibe phezu kwakho, hini na lusapho lukaIbrâhîm, inene Yena (uAllâh) ngowokudunyiswa, nokuzukiswa.”
Lwathi lusakudamba uvalo (entliziyweni) kaIbrâhîm neendaba ezivuyisayo zifikile kuye, waqalisa ukuSicenga ngabantu bakwaLût
Inene	ngokungathandabuzekiyo	uIbrâhîm, wayenokunyamezela, ebiza rhoqo kuAllâh ngokuzithobileyo, kananjalo wayenenguquko yena
“Hini na Ibrâhîm! Kuyeke oku3, inene, uMyalelo weNkosi yakho sele uphumile, inene baza kufikelwa sisohlwayo esingekhe sibuyiselwe umva
Zathi zisakufika iziThunywa zeThu kuLût waba buhlungu ngenxa yabo (abantu bakubo4), waziva onakele emphefumlweni wakhe. Wathi: “Le yimini ebuhlungu.”

Ke kaloku abantu bakubo beza begxalathelana kuye, njengoko kwangaphambili babedla ngokwenza izenzo zokungcola, wathi yena: “Hini na bantu bakuthi! Nazi iintombi zam zona zihlambulukile kuni (ukuba niyazitshata). Ke ngoko yoyikani uAllâh ningandihlazi ngokuphathelene neendwendwe zam! Ingaba akusekho namnye na apha kuni onengqondo?”
Bathi bona: “Ngokuqinisekileyo wazi kakuhle wena okokuba thina asinamdla, singenawo nomnqweno weentombi zakho, eneneni ukwazi kakuhle esikufunayo thina wena.”
Wathi yena: “Akwaba bendinamandla okunoyisa okanye ndibalekele kumxhasi onamandla.”

Zathi (iziThunywa) zona: “Hini na (Lût)! Inene, thina siziziThunywa ezivela eNkosini yakho! Abayi kufikelela kuwe! Ke kaloku wena hamba nosapho lwakho kwisahlulo sobusuku, kungabikho namnye kuni unyeka ngasemva; ngaphandle komfazi wakho, inene, isohlwayo esiza kuthwaxa bona siza kuthwaxa yena, inene, ekuseni iya kuba lixesha labo elimisiweyo. Ayikho kufuphi na intsasa?”
